Sarah Ransohoff
Posts
About

Hi, I'm Sarah Ransohoff. I am a software engineer, an improviser, a painter, and a real life human. I value communication, good questions, and fun.

Education and Experience

I graduated from The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill with a degree in United States History, and I studied art history and studio art for a year in Italy and Greece with The Aegean Center. After teaching myself to use the Adobe Suite and a touch of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for four months, I went to The Flatiron School's Web Development Program for five months. For the next two years, I worked at Venmo on the web team, building products that helped make Venmo safer and more accessible. And now, I'm at Recurse Center until November 2016, working on whatever my heart desires.
